data.title: Great welcome
data.text:
Visited after reading previous reviews nice warm welcome very nice decor and ambiance 
Good attentive service and really nice breakfast not overly big on portion size but was well cooked  presented well and tasty 
Would go again good value

data.title: Hidden Gem!
data.text: My mom and I recently found this place and now it's one of our favorite places to eat. Breakfast is amazing! Lunch is awesome as well. We've loved every dish we've ordered. I love the breakfast gravy, corn chowder soup, grilled cheese, and my parents love the ahi burger. They have a children's menu and the cheese pizza is enough for 2 kids!  I think most people drive by so quickly down Beach Blvd they miss it.  The staff is so friendly and accommodating. I feel like I get a gourmet meal without breaking the bank.  Choose to dine inside or on the patio. Hours are weekdays 7-4 pm and 9-4 pm on the weekends.

data.title: Appreciate the renovation!
data.text: I think it's great when businesses use an existing structure and especially when they improve it and make it more beautiful!  Food & service were fine. Menu options are interesting and creative.

data.title: Fav
data.text: This place is usually our go to place for breakfast when we are in Anaheim. Love it!! Everything is good and the waitress' are wonderful!

data.title: Expected better....
data.text: Ate breakfast here during our stay in Buena Park...On entering the parking lot there were no cars which is probably not a great sign...also observed a help wanted sign for a server and cook, also not a good sign...as we were hungry we decided to give it a shot anyway...sat outside on the patio as it was a beautiful day...I thought that our server forgot we were there more than once....the food was okay, not great...reviewed before going on another popular website so we expected more...maybe a bad day, not sure, but when you pay close to fifty dollars for breakfast, including tip, for two adults and a five year old, you expect more....thumbs down...

data.title: Worth a return visit
data.text:
We were greeted with a welcoming smile In a comfortable space to relax the deck. Surprisingly there wasn't much road noise so table conversation was easy.
We only ordered salads and the shoyu wings. The salads were good, as might be expected - easily improved with higher quality product.
The shoyu wings were quite tasty, I would order those again.
A bit higher quality products and raise the prices a bit (yes, raise) and Tice will soon go from an area alternative eatery to a front runner.
Keep up the great service!

data.title: Business Lunch
data.text: Held a group meeting here, we ate outside on the deck and it was really nice.  Being on Beach Boulevard I was afraid it would be noisy but it was very pleasant and the food was delicious.  Would definitely return for business or pleasure.

data.title: A great dining experience
data.text:
Here is what I appreciate about Tice House Cafe:
The owner has clearly put a lot of thought into his restaurant , having re-purposes a California Bungalow house facing busy Beach Blvd. The outside deck was built for a comfortable dining experience.

- The prices were pleasantly reasonable- if not a little on the low side, given the pricey real estate in the area.

- The coffee is amazing - not that nasty Farmer Bros crap. This place did not cut corners here and I appreciate that. And it was served in a bowl-size mug!

- service is exceptional

- Food tastes awesome and the attention to detail was very evident.

data.title: A grat new place
data.text: The Tice House opened late in 2015 and is a welcome addition to the many café in Buena Park.  They serve great meals and try different menu items to expand their menu.  The staff is friendly and try's to meet your requirements for a great meal.

data.title: Great food!
data.text: I needed a rest stop and went to the welcome center next door.  Found this little gem and had a cup of coffee on the patio.  They serve breakfast all day which is a plus in my book!

data.title: Only one server :(
data.text: We decided to give this restaurant a try.  Lunch time was busy, however they only had one server working.  She was overwhelmed.  I saw a family sit down, but left after a few minutes because they were not acknowledged.  The food was very good, and the portion size was just right.
